title: Coterra, Devon Are in Advanced Talks on Combination
description: Coterra Energy Inc. and Devon Energy Corp. are in advanced talks about a combination, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be one of the largest oil and natural gas deals in years.
content: Coterra Energy Inc. and Devon Energy Corp. are in advanced talks about a combination, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be one of the largest oil and natural gas deals in years.
